name: klaus
text:
So many great things in this strip.

"Is SO cool."
"I could play a trumpet with my cock", and Cornelius' subsequent reaction to that statement.

name: delzhand
text: Don't forget "You know how computers suck!"

name: tellumo
text: I have a degree in computer science and have contributed to publications in the field, and am firmly convinced that computers suck.

name: gethen
text: oh definitely. the more you study them the more you know this is true.

name: boredom_man
text: ...also refers to surgical techniques, quarks, and post-colonial studies.

name: norsef
text:
I just read through a couple of medical journals at the library. I have now become deathly afraid of doctors.

Every single article seemed to start with phrases like "existing treatment proves ineffective/fatal" and "Despite thousands of cases being treated the area has seen little research." Also loads of stuff about nurses not washing their hands.

name: lylebot
text: In fact, every Ph.D. thesis in CS has a chapter on how much computers suck.  It may be oblique, but it's there, trust me.

name: riazm
text: Lyle just doesn't trust anything that can be on, and apparently working, but not moving .

name: panamajack
text: Or the penis pun in the alt text.

name: davidbowie
text: A comment left by davidbowie was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by riotdejaneiro, DeimosRising, goocifer, equinn2006, bookofsand, Quartzblade, aperson)

name: jdhenry105
text: I originally thought that Cornelius was going to take Lyle's suggestion, rather than hiding the trumpet.

name: sakana
text:
You know that's what I thought for a long while.

Now I feel dirty.

name: thatcrazycommie
text: Oh my god. This is easily the fifth time I've read GOF and all this time I thought Cornelius Bear was about to play that trumpet with his cock.

name: professorhazard
text: You're not the only one.

name: jonmw
text: All you need to do is reverse the order of the last two panels and this interpretation becomes a lot more likely.

name: laserblade
text: Oh man, I JUST got that. I was sure that, while Lyle would just talk about playing the trumpet with his cock, Connie was a bad enough man to actually go and do it. In fact, I still feel that way, even though I've been proven wrong.

name: jetbunny
text: Show of hands, who thought Cornelius was about to rock the trump-cock?

name: fairmountfair
text: HAND!  Just now, 2 and a half years later, did I realize.

name: tripperday
text: I'm prety sure I did.

name: goro
text: Word.

name: mctanuki
text: I saw this when it was first posted, and it took re-reading the hardcover for the third time to see the proper panel sequence here.

name: anzio
text: I honestly just thought he was hiding it to avoid such an act to be committed against his own trumpet.

name: pete1729
text: I interpreted it to be Cornelius who was about to quietly and with great dignity and pride play The Star Spangled banner on the trumpet with his cock.

name: stuntman
text: yeah, the missing frame.  Onstad probably has it locked up in his personal archives.

name: bixschmix
text: Yes! I as well. That's why Assetbar is useful-- for making you feel like a complete dumbass with a dirty mind and to learn what's actually happening.

name: malesherbez
text: just perfect I think

name: phthoggos
text: Ambiguous!

name: hateandwar
text: Yeah, who won the fight? Vlad or Lyle! I couldn't watch that fight, I love them both too much.

name: mercuri0us
text: Can you please, from now on, just like, make every comment just one word and an exclamation mark.  It just works so perfectly with that avatar.  Thanks.

name: cryabetes
text: best stand-alone comic in the GOF story line, for sure.

name: epicurus
text: I had to read this one like ten times before I got why Cornelius was doing that. Am I retarded?

name: cicadalek
text: I think the few seconds (or views, whatever) it takes for the punchline to sink in make it glorious.

name: rogergs
text: Cornelius is not one to take a chance, where metaphors are concerned.

name: johnnyc
text: Lyle doesn't strike me as the metaphorical type.

name: kreftron
text: Lyle is straight up describing the Achewood fanbase's feelings upon reading the GOF.

name: straw
text: How this one isn't a perfect 5 or at least 4.9 is beyond me.

name: inspectorx
text: "two buns in a pickle", "fairly arseholed", "play a trumpet with my cock". this comic is so, so good. and faintly homoerotic too. i loves it.

name: evolume
text: My Russian friend once confided in me that he tried to fit the flower tube from his lady's VW Bug over his cock.  We rarely talk these days.

name: steerpike66
text: Note the PROMINENTLY displayed keyhole in the drawer in the final frame. Lyle aint gettin' that trumpet.

name: saint
text:
unless he's feeling powerful to open a lock with his cock.
...
I'm gonna get lamed out of commission just for the alliteration...I know it, and I accept this as my fate. Forgive them Father, for they know not what they do.

name: oishii
text: I don't think you know what alliteration is.

name: saint
text: yeah, I mistook alliteration for rhyming for some reason. I realized it after I posted...I just hoped no one would notice. Dumb dirty dick.

name: salo
text: No biggie. We can say that you did a three letter reverse alliteration, on two of the words, I suppose.

name: ellameno
text: WHAT

name: presterjohn
text: Having a cock that works as a lockpick would be the opposite of a good thing.

name: catgrl131
text: Um, chastity belt problems anyone? No need to fear! You have the power of the lockpick cock!

name: direhaggis
text: It would certainly have made "Gone in 60 Seconds" more interesting.

name: joeyramoney
text: i wonder if lyle implied that in his jubilation he has the newfound ability to expel air from his urethra in a forceful and controlled manner, or if he could simply use it to press and hold the valve keys of the instrument.

name: mr_lostman28
text: I have often wondered this too... I mean you have to buzz to play the trumpet too.... JEEZ.. every time I think of this strip my legs instictively cross. Playing a trumpet with your cock just sounds unpleasant.

name: stuntman
text: oh man, is SO cool.

name: splendorr
text: No offense, but just to clarify, I accidentally chubbed this while rapidly scrolling on an iPad. I now keep my fingers safely in the margins.

name: kochipoik
text: Maybe he'd be playing with someone else, maybe a lady, who would do the blowing. Or maybe he'll press the buttons with it, and blow with something down there that's used to blowing.

text: i thought he would probably just end up parading it. or something

name: jshelton
text: The silence in the last three panels is what TOTALLY makes this strip.

text: too bad cornelius was not as careful with his drum.

name: plezure
text: mommy?

text: Eye of the Tiger on a trumpet?

name: numberkillinger
text: you know which eye he means

name: soticoto
text: Synergy chubb.

name: goatmasterflash
text: ...one eye of the tiger, anyhow

name: mangtastic
text: I have heard Eye of the Tiger played on the trumpet.  It is a fairly basic song to learn on it, often played by enthusiastic High School Band members.  In this case, it also doubles as a pun, as lyle is a tiger and his urethra can be considered an eye.

name: clever-nickname
text: Cornelius seems to be a very devoted player of brass instruments. Not only does he play a french horn, but the trumpet as well.

name: goatmasterflash
text: Well I hope he locked the French horn up as well. It's possible that Lyle knows the difference between the two, but I doubt he cares.

name: professorhazard
text: The Tenmen have a gaspworthy level of fame to such as a blogging cat from the United Kingdom? I remember back when they played in Ray's bathtub.

name: johnnyc
text: Their rise to fame is best described as "meteoric."

name: mrwombat
text: Meteors do not rise!

name: riotdejaneiro
text: Also : Ted seems to get on about Arse-nal a lot.

name: stuntman
text: another reason for me to stay out of the 'burbs: tetchy suburban cowboys

name: zeal
text: I wish Lyle had gone to the Fight.  He would've been a good edition to the Stubbs Army.

name: tellumo
text: Maybe gin and/or JD are banned under the Fight's performance-enhancing drugs policy? Brandy is ok, though.

name: weapon86
text: I've always thought of playing my boy-hood trumpet with my man-hood, but Grandma always walked in at the last second...

name: xiaomimi
text:
Weekend Blogs

Pat: Great new game.
Nice Pete: A second car.

name: madmangosteen
text: for some reason Vlad's "recipe for two buns in a pickle" is funnier to me than almost any single line in the GOF arc.

name: drago25
text:
Agreed, that one almost had me on the floor.

This strip reminded me why Lyle & Vlad are two of my favourite characters.

name: deblacquiere
text: When I very first read this, I thought the "squeee" referred to the noise made by...

name: doubleclef
text: "Quick, hide the trumpet!"

name: fuzzery
text: So why isn't Lyle in the GOF?

name: invidious
text: Because he's nothing more than a drunk-ass brawler.  His only technique is to run at you full speed, all fists n' elbows, hoping something connects.  We're not talking strategy or savvy, here, just brute force.  The moment Lyle came across a dude with any skills it'd be all over.  He's basically the Kimbo Slice of Achewood.

name: awksedperl
text: And Ramses Luther is Fedor.

text: Ditto Chubby

text: UH OH. Gasps and Giggles is still written by Barry Best in this one. It should be Barry King. Onstaaaaad, ju got some splanin' to do!

text: He writes under a soubriquet rouge. You know, to protect his family an' all.

text: haha nice! And I as well, but on the harmonica. We should start a band.

text: I'd be interested in how the actual trumpet-playing would occur. The only thing I can think of is unspeakably dirty (so dirty, it's unspeakable).

text: SAY IT

text: jizm

text:
This strip is TOO GOOD.

I wish i could give this a higher rating than five.

text:
this strip has always caused me to picture a small cartoon penis with a mouth and teeth. not playing a trumpet, mind. he's singing.

hello my baby, hello my honey, hello my ragtime gal... send me a kiss by wire, baby my urethra's on fire

name: jaldor
text: Hilarious strip all around, but Lyle calling Vlad a commie pig is what did it for me. Lyle doesn't pull any punches.

name: stonecrab
text: Daaam. Didn't notice until I read these comments! I thought Cornelius was gonna try it... Kinda like dyslexia or else i have a dirty mind...

name: berami
text: Phillipe peeping over the chair, trying to read off the screen alone made this a five for me.  I have such a soft spot for the little guy.

name: re5urgam
text: Aww, I just now saw that! Hee!

name: all-star951
text: Vlad develops eyebrows in the second panel.

name: amphibians
text: I was eating yogurt (I feel like that is not how one spells yogurt) when I read this, and a soon as I read I could play a trumpet with my cock I was laughing so hard a bit dribbled down my chin and on to my shirt.

name: kalethan
text: O mi god, o mi god, 5-ed into infinity for the slow, deliberate Corneliun securing of the trumpet! (also, to the nay-sayers... i think that it wouldn't be impossible or even necessarily unpleasant to play a trumpet with one's wangdoodle... how wide spread are the peaks and troughs of YOUR resonating wavelengths?!?!? )

name: abe
text: Every boy ever has done panel 4 thru 6.
